questions.question: Who is responsible for securing the data in an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket, according to the shared responsibility model?
options: AWS is solely responsible for securing the data in an Amazon S3 bucket.
The customer is solely responsible for securing the data in an Amazon S3 bucket.
Both AWS and the customer share responsibility for securing the data in an Amazon S3 bucket.
The responsibility for securing the data in an Amazon S3 bucket depends on the specific use case and configuration.
correct_answers: Both AWS and the customer share responsibility for securing the data in an Amazon S3 bucket.
